turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi how can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I was looking to order some coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay I can help you with that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. I'd like a venti eggnog latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay and did you want whipped cream on it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, any syrup?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay and what kind of milk should they use?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Whole milk, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great so that's a venti eggnog latte with hole milk and whipped cream right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great I'll place that order for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm seeing a lot of starbucks near you which one is closest.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one in the Beachwood Mall.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay great. I've placed your order with the starbucks at the Birchwood mall. It will be ready in 15 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, have a nice time.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.
